args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Trump ends with a bold promise for a ‘golden age’ President Donald Trump ended his speech on an optimistic note about the future of the United States, while making a dig at his predecessor by asserting that the “nation has suffered greatly” in recent years. “We will be a nation like no other,” he said. “Full of compassion, courage and exceptionalism. Our power will stop all wars and bring a new spirit of unity to a world that has been angry, violent and totally unpredictable.” Trump has not yet specified what his plan is to end the war in Ukraine, which he promised to stop during his tenure. Biden officials involved in arranging the ceasefire and hostage-release agreement in the Middle East acknowledged that Trump and his Middle East envoy, Steve Witkoff, played a role in bringing the deal across the finish line. Trump shocked the political establishment at his first inauguration by straying from the formula for these speeches, painting a dark picture of “American carnage.” On Monday, he again presented a negative view of the current state of affairs, but he ended on a far more traditional tone that acknowledged the ambition and success of Americans. “We will dream boldly, and nothing will stand in our way because we are Americans,” he said. “The future is ours and our golden age has just begun.”
